scripts.docker:rm:image: docker image rmi app-frontend app-backend postgres
scripts.docker:rm: docker container stop db_ng app_backend app_frontend && docker container rm db_ng app_backend app_frontend && docker image rmi app-frontend app-backend postgres
scripts.install:front: cd app && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.install:back: cd app && cd backend && npm install
scripts.install:all: npm run install:front && npm run install:back
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd app && cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev --name init --preview-feature && npx prisma db push
